amendment.description: To appropriate an additional $70,000,000 to enhance the security of chemical plants and to provide an offset.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 3619 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 47. Record Vote Number: 176.

Amendment SA 3619 proposed by Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S9057-9061; text: CR S9057) To appropriate an additional $70,000,000 to enhance the security of chemical plants and to provide an offset.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 3619 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 47. Record Vote Number: 176.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3619 proposed by Senator Corzine.
